question: In the Constituent Assembly, a motion demanding a new assembly elected on the basis of Adult Franchise was moved by __?
explanation: It was Hasarat Mohani, who moved this motion but the motion was rejected because of impracticality. Please note that Hasrat Mohani was a member who could not speak English, and rest all could. Here you should also note that on 15th November 1939 C. Rajagopalachari had first voiced the demand for a Constituent Assembly based on adult franchise.
